text: I and others would be curious to know what toolchain you used to make your editor. Building complex graphical interactive software like your editor is the goal of several of the FoC projects here, and i am very interested in people's experiences, good and bad, using existing tools like Electron, etc. The Editor is often more work than the product underneath it.
